alert.note: Alert for Pueblo (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued June 13 at 5:17AM MDT until June 14 at 10:48PM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...Forecast flooding changed from Moderate to Major severity and increased in duration for the following rivers in Colorado... Arkansas River NEAR Avondale affecting Pueblo County. .Recent heavy rainfall on Fountain Creek will keep the Arkansas River near Avondale above flood stage. For the Lower Arkansas River...including Avondale...Major flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL LATE TOMORROW EVENING... * WHAT...Major flooding is occurring and major flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Arkansas River NEAR Avondale. * WHEN...Until late tomorrow evening. * IMPACTS...At 9.0 feet, Major Flood. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 5:00 AM MDT Tuesday the stage was 9.1 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 5:00 AM MDT Tuesday was 9.1 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 9.8 feet this afternoon. It will then fall below flood stage late tomorrow morning. - Flood stage is 7.0 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 9.8 feet on 06/18/1965. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Stay tuned to further developments by listening to your local radio, television, or NOAA Weather Radio for further information. Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued this afternoon at 515 PM MDT.
